activity.text:
@rithviknishad @Jacobjeevan Can I work on this issue if it's relevant
My Approach:
- Identify the rot cause of the issue by analyzing how react-hook-form's Controller interacts with @radix-ui/react-select.
- Wrap the Select component with React.forwardRef() to properly handle refs.
- Update the UserForm.tsx (or relevant file) to use the corrected Select component.
